quotes.quote: To give anything less than your best, is to sacrifice the gift.
The great gift of human beings is that we have the power of empathy.
Every gift which is given, even though it be small, is in reality great, if it is given with affection.
Love the giver more than the gift.
Each day offers us the gift of being a special occasion if we can simply learn that as well as giving, it is blessed to receive with grace and a grateful heart.
We make a living by what we get, but we make a life by what we give.
The older I get, the better I understand that every day is a gift.
The greatest gift you can give another is the purity of your attention.
The meaning of life is to find your gift. The purpose of life is to give it away.
The greatest gift that you can give yourself is a little bit of your own attention.
The manner of giving is worth more than the gift.
Your gift is not what you do but what you are.
The secret of success lies in the perfection of one's gift and working frantically towards God's given potential.
You give but little when you give of your possessions. It is when you give of yourself that you truly give.
The greatest gift is a portion of thyself.
Your personal truth is your gift to the world.
There's no greater gift than thinking that you had some impact on the world, for the better.
The most beautiful gift of nature is that it gives one pleasure to look around and try to comprehend what we see.
It's so tempting to resist a little gift when you're expecting the otherwise.
The most considerate gift you can offer to someone who gave you advice is to not saddle them with the fallout of you ignoring it.
In terms of instilling the values of mental toughness and work ethic, discipline is the gift that keeps on giving.
The greatest gift is our own eyes, sense of smell, and abilities to deduce.
God wants nothing of you but the gift of a peaceful heart.
I think relationships are work, but love is a gift.
Someone I loved once gave me a box full of darkness. It took me years to understand that this too, was a gift.
Anything that had to do with art I been doing all my life. It was a gift. It's nothing I work real hard at doing.
The gift of learning to meditate is the greatest gift you can give yourself in this lifetime.
Realize that your gift does not belong merely to you.
A gift of truth is the gift of love.
I believe that the greatest gift you can give your family and the world is a healthy you.
You can give without loving, but you can never love without giving.
With the gift of listening comes the gift of healing.
Breath is the finest gift of nature. Be grateful for this wonderful gift.
Give whatever you are doing and whoever you are with the gift of your attention.
A gift consists not in what is done or given, but in the intention of the giver or doer.
Yesterday is history, tomorrow is a mystery, today is God's gift, that's why we call it the present.
I look upon life as a gift from God. I did nothing to earn it. Now that the time is coming to give it back, I have no right to complain
The greatest gift of life is friendship, and I have received it.
If you love someone, the greatest gift you can give them is your presence.
The gift of life is so precious that we should feel an obligation to pay back the universe for the gift of being alive.
A book is a gift you can open again and again.
Make all you can, save all you can, give all you can.
The greatest gift you can ever give another person is your own happiness.
Love is a gift worth giving, sometimes you just give more than you revive.
The greatest gift that you can give to others is the gift of unconditional love and acceptance.
Greatness comes from the inside and once you believe you have it, it's yours to share with the world.
Every great person is always being helped by everybody; for their gift is to get good out of all things and all persons.
Everytime you smile at someone, it is an action of love, a gift to that person, a beautiful thing.
The greatest gift is the ability to forget to forget the bad things and focus on the good.
The best gifts come from the heart, not the store.
I believe the Bible is the best gift God has ever given to man.
Blessed are they who have the gift of making friends,for it is one of God's best gifts.
The Gift of Truth excels all other Gifts.
In accepting the Gift you Honor the Giver.
Every gift from a friend is a wish for your happiness.
Youth is the gift of nature, but age is a work of art.
You don't choose your family. They are God's gift to you, as you are to them.
Your talent is God's gift to you. What you do with it is your gift back to God.
The gift without the giver is rare.
The greatest gift in life is to be remembered.
The gift you offer another person is just your being.
